languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит бесстрастно и холодно:{/n} "Хула в адрес {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} также была зафиксирована. Отрицание лишено смысла".
{n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля звучит бесстрастно и холодно:{/n} "Хула в адрес {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g} также была зафиксирована. Отрицание лишено смысла".

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声は無表情で冷たく聞こえる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}に向けられた罵詈雑言も同様に登録された。否定しても無意味である」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声は無表情で冷たく聞こえる。{/n}「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}に向けられた罵詈雑言も同様に登録された。否定しても無意味である」

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音听起来冷酷无情。{/n}“针对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的不敬之语，同样被记录下来。否认毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音听起来冷酷无情。{/n}“针对{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的不敬之语，同样被记录下来。否认毫无意义。”

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal suena impasible y fría:{/n} «También se han registrado vituperios hacia el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Negarlo es fútil».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal suena impasible y fría:{/n} «También se han registrado vituperios hacia el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}. Negarlo es fútil».

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal est froide et impassible.{/n} « Des vitupérations à l'encontre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} ont également été enregistrées. Il ne sert à rien de le nier. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Pasqal est froide et impassible.{/n} « Des vitupérations à l'encontre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} ont également été enregistrées. Il ne sert à rien de le nier. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt teilnahmslos und kalt:{/n} "Es wurden auch Schmähungen des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} registriert. Leugnen ist zwecklos."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme klingt teilnahmslos und kalt:{/n} "Es wurden auch Schmähungen des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} registriert. Leugnen ist zwecklos."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, kayıtsız ve soğuk bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus'a{/g} yöneltilen hakaretler de kaydedildi. İnkâr etmenin faydası yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice sounds impassive and cold:{/n} "Vituperation directed at the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} was likewise registered. Denial is meaningless."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kayıtsız ve soğuk bir ses tonuyla konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n}" {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}' yöneltilen hakaretler de kaydedildi. İnkâr etmenin faydası yok."
